data.title: Show locations of client and servers using a local GeoIP database

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
using https://github.com/maxmind/geoip-api-csharp2 and a free CC-BY-SA 3.0 database with country accuracy. I also try to grab the IP for localhost from the UPnP enabled router now if Mono-NAT succeeds in finding it.

I believe this is a good indicator for people to check for trolls / identity theft.
![lobby](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/756669/926183/b62df764-ff86-11e2-8ee3-a8c1d38b63b8.png)

as well as try to estimate if the game will lag and choose nearby opponents #2555
![serverbrowser](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/756669/926200/f19e3cd2-ff86-11e2-9070-a8d9048c9c54.png)

I am also curious where our players from all over the world originate. :)

data.title: Separate skirmish vs mission map options.

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
Missions and minigames shouldn't show options for shroud, starting units, crates, etc.

It would be better to define a separate options panel that keeps the mission difficulty and cheats(?), but removes the UI for everything else.

data.title: Larger rotor for Hind.
data.body: The default lrotor looks too small for the mighty Hind, so I made a larger one.

data.title: Orca missile fix.
data.body: Orca now alternates between missile pods instead of firing all missiles from right pod.

data.title: CnC mod muzzles and offsets
data.body: Muzzles and fixed offsets for C&C mod.

data.title: `System.InvalidOperationException`: Nullable object must have a value

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
Mod: ra
Game: new game (public)
Map: Breaking Point
Players:  7 AI (Team 2) vs Host (Team 1)
After 38:25:  http://pastie.org/8207776
Replay:  http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&p=285558#285558

From IRC:

```
08·05·34pm· Scott` · it's probably line 655
08·05·44pm· Scott` ·                    owner.Target = owner.bot.FindClosestEnemy(AverageUnitsPosition(owner.units).Value.CenterPosition, WRange.FromCells(8));
08·05·55pm· Scott` · AverageUnitsPosition(owner.units) is going to be null
```

data.title: Starting unit selection crashes dedicated servers

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
Dedicated servers don't load a shellmap, so Rules.Info is null.
This causes `Rules.Info["world"].Traits.WithInterface<MPStartUnitsInfo>();` to NRE.

We may need to invent the machinery for the server / lobby to query rules info independently of the shellmap. This would allow maps to override races #3012 etc too.

data.title: [playtest 20130804] general feedback
data.body:
- Options shouldnt be hidden. If someone activates cheats you wont notice cause nobody checks that.
- Server crashes when i select option "heavy supprt" (not just MCV)
- i personally do NOT like the new frozen fog thing.
- i cant auto attack buildings which are under the fog (cursor does not change). i have to use force attack. #3636

data.title: Offsets and muzzle flashes
data.body: Sets LocalOffsets for weapons that didn't have one, improves offsets that weren't accurate, and enables muzzle flashes on all cannon/heavy gun weapons in RA mod.

data.title: fixed RA map: ATHENA
data.body:
removed Actor656 tran.husk1 (was burning down) and replaced it with rocks.
Note: map has been tested after this change.

data.title: Restore alt-f4 for windows users only.
Buildings frozen under fog require force attack

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: It makes sense as you shoot in the dark, but it is a little annoying.

data.title: StyleCop Cleanup
data.body: Addresses #3562. I also cleaned up some seldomly edited files (to avoid rebase conflicts) and the smaller projects as a whole. If it was not for https://github.com/DarkCloud14/MonoDevelop.StyleCop/issues/6 all the time I might have even finished this.

data.title: Clean up loose ends with fog and lobby options.
data.body:
- Freeze civilian / map buildings under fog (#3614).
- Freeze walls under fog.
- Add lobby options for shroud & fog.
- Allow mods to specify default lobby settings.
- Reset default lobby options when a dedicated server clears.
- Add @ScottNZ's starting unit configuration for RA.

data.body:

Please consider this =\

data.title: fixed RA map: ATHENA (koth)

-- removed residual wall on main island

data.title: Actors at mapboarders can not be deleted
data.body:
![boardertreegroup](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5147014/900689/fc41ebc6-fb6b-11e2-8edc-bb712e1988f6.JPG)
Hi, I was talking in the Irc with chrisf about my problem. I made a map and it crashed while testing.
I changed the mapsize to a setting that supports at least a free cell in all directions. Still crashed..
chrisf -> remove all actors at the "free cells" around the map. 
Problem -> I'm unable to remove positioned treegroup, which are bigger than 1 cell, whch are positioned at y = -1 reaching inside the map to y = 1
I tried to resize again but,  I'm still unable to remove this trees :(

data.title: defense buildings autotarget should obey player orders
data.body: Defense buildings autotarget is broken. You assign your (example:) turret to attack the arti, it switches back to attack some other stuff.  I think its always the players job to pick targets to force micromanagement. If nothing is given, shoot the nearest enemy, whatever type it is.
